hero.title:
Hello!
I'm Ivan Milincic...
hero.text: A freelance web developer with a passion for crafting high-quality custom websites.

intro.title: Professional [Web Development]
intro.text: Web design and development is my full time job. Not a side work or a hobby! I'm completely dedicated to my clients and projects, offering professional service and long term support. I cover all aspects of your website, from design and development to hosting, maintenance, and content management.

outsourcing.title: [Outsourcing] Services
outsourcing.text: Freelance web development and outsourcing services for digital agencies with long-term support and competitive pricing. There is no employment bureaucracy and additional costs for you. We just focus on work and to get things done!
